title: Speed Converter
description: Convert between different speed and velocity units

sections.title: About Speed Conversion
content: Speed conversion is essential for transportation, physics, engineering, and navigation across different measurement systems.

sections.title: Speed Units
content: Metric: Meters per second (m/s), Kilometers per hour (km/h)
Imperial: Miles per hour (mph), Feet per second (ft/s)
Nautical: Knots (kn) - used in aviation and marine navigation
Scientific: Mach (speed of sound), Speed of light (c)
